概述  软件包   类  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

jcurses.event
接口 ItemListener

所有超级接口：
Listener
所有已知实现类：
FileDialog, PopUpMenu
public interface ItemListener
extends Listener

The interface has to be implemented to listen on instances of ItemEvent

方法摘要
 void stateChanged(ItemEvent event)
          The method will be called by an widget, generating ItemEvent instances, if the listener has been registered by it.
 

方法详细信息

stateChanged

void stateChanged(ItemEvent event)
The method will be called by an widget, generating ItemEvent instances, if the listener has been registered by it.

参数：
event - the event occured
